parameter.name: sleepTimeEnabled
parameter.description: When set to true, t or 1, will enable sleep time for the user. Sleep time is the time when push or SMS notifications should not be sent to the user.

parameter.name: startSleepTime
parameter.description: The hour that sleep time should begin if it is enabled. The value for this parameter should be provided in ISO8601 format (i.e. 00-23).

parameter.name: endSleepTime
parameter.description: The hour that sleep time should end if it is enabled.

parameter.name: timeZone
parameter.description: The timezone dates and times should be displayed in for the user(Eg:Europe, Copenhagen, etc).
